meanings.definition: A person or thing that integrates.
meanings.sent1: The integrators in our team always find ways to bring everyone together.
meanings.sent2: The integrators in the company help ensure smooth communication between departments.
meanings.sent3: The integrators at the party made sure everyone was having a good time.
meanings.sent4: She was like an integrator, seamlessly blending different ideas into a cohesive plan.
meanings.sent5: The integrators in nature, like bees pollinating flowers, play a crucial role in the ecosystem.

meanings.definition: A device or circuit that performs integration.
meanings.sent1: The electronic integrators in the lab help analyze signals accurately.
meanings.sent2: Modern technology relies on integrators to process data efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The integrators in the machine worked tirelessly to calculate the results.
meanings.sent4: The integrators functioned like a skilled mathematician, summing up values with precision.
meanings.sent5: Using integrators in the system is like having a reliable calculator for complex calculations.
